forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 6. Wind chill values as low as -7. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 21. Wind chill values as low as -7. West wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet embrace of night, Boston rests under a clear sky, the air crisp and biting as temperatures flirt with the low single digits. A gentle northwest wind whispers through the streets, occasionally rising, creating a wind chill that could make one rethink a late-night stroll. As dawn approaches, the world becomes a canvas of delicate frost, an invitation for early risers to wrap themselves in layers—perhaps a thick scarf and a well-worn coat—before stepping outside into this chilly tableau.

As the sun finds its way into the morning, expect a pleasant shift as the day unfolds with mostly sunny skies and a high that gently climbs to the low twenties. The wind may continue to brush against the face, yet the warmth of the sun will encourage those brave enough to venture out. Today is perfect for a stroll through the quiet streets, perhaps a visit to a nearby café where the comforting aroma of freshly brewed coffee warms the souls of patrons. In such invigorating weather, one might find joy in simply observing the city awaken, taking in the serene beauty of a winter’s day, with nature’s crisp soundtrack as the backdrop to everyday life.
